question: Supratim Bandyopadhyay was recently appointed as Chairman of which Indian statutory body?
option1: PFRDA- Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority
option2: IRDAI- Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority
option3: SEBI- Securities and Exchange Board of India
answer: PFRDA- Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority
explanation:
Supratim Bandyopadhyay was recently appointed as Chairman of the Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA). It is a statutory body which regulates the Pension system in the country.
Supratim was serving as a Member (Finance) in PFRDA, prior to this appointment. The Appointments Committee of Cabinet approved the appointment of Bandyopadhyay as the Chairman for a period of five years.
